definition: Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia

sentences.english: All of them are either close to or intermixed with Wa or Mongla-controlled areas.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是要么接近或混淆佤联军或勐腊军控制区。

sentences.english: This statue was found in Temple T at Kawa , in Upper Nubia.
sentences.chinese: 这座雕像被发现在庙由T佤，在上努比亚。

sentences.english: He asked the UWSA to cooperate with the officials and assure their safety.
sentences.chinese: 他要求佤联军配合这些官员，并确保他们的安全。

sentences.english: The group's current headquarters is Panghsang, on the China-Burma border.
sentences.chinese: 佤联军目前的总部所在地是邦康，位于中缅边境。

sentences.english: He is reportedly close to the UWSA.
sentences.chinese: 据说他攀法接近佤联军。
